ProductInfo.Features:

<7> LCD Screen Protectors + <8> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') + <9> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <12> Image Recovery Software
